# PED::SET_PED_SHOULD_PLAY_IMMEDIATE_SCENARIO_EXIT

## Summary
Control how the ped leaves their scenario when they get their next task.

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex: The ped who should exit immediately the next time they are given a script command.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
When this ped receives its next script task, they will immediately blend out of their scenario.
They will quit their scenario task immediately.
